response.overview: Crawford the Cat has big plans when he wakes up on Christmas Eve morning. He and his friends are going ice skating, sleigh riding, Christmas Tree shopping and present buying all before noon. Sadly, Crawford learns his favorite Aunt Kittypat is snowed-in and won't be coming for her holiday visit, but the friends make the best of it anyway until an unexpected visitor brings a joyous surprise.
response.title: Crawford the Cat's Christmas
